cmp: 虫 (insect/worm, an animal/an invertebrate/a worm/an insect)

exm.mng: lit. the dragonfly touches the water lightly, superficial contact (idiom)
Odonata, order consisting of about 6,000 species of dragonflies and damselflies

lit. the dragon-fly shakes the stone tower (idiom); fig. to overestimate one's capabilities
the sword moves like a dragon-fly (modern idiom), fig. unexpected winning move, unconventional gambit
